description: Concatenation of numbers in n-th row of triangle of Stirling numbers of second kind (A008277).
references: Amarnath Murthy, A general result on the Smarandache Star function, Smarandache Notions Journal, Vol. 11, No. 1-2-3, Spring 2000.
Amarnath Murthy, Properties of Smarandache Star Triangle, Smarandache Notions Journal, Vol. 11, No. 1-2-3, Spring 2000.
maple: with(combinat, stirling2): for n from 1 to 15 do for k from 1 to n do printf(`%d`, stirling2(n,k)) od: printf(`,`): od:
author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Apr 21 2001
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Apr 23 2001
